contents.text: Thank you for calling Scal.io in San Francisco, where we handcraft software solutions.
To learn more about our custom software development services, press 1.
To discuss a new project or schedule a consultation, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our project consultation team. We appreciate your patience.

navigationGoals: I want to schedule a consultation to discuss a new software project.
I’d like to schedule a consultation to discuss building a custom software solution for veterans benefit management.
I’d like to schedule a technical scoping session for a new microservices architecture project.
I’d like to set up a consultation to discuss creating a custom software solution.
Schedule a consultation to explore building a custom physics simulation tool for my research.

contents.text: To request a quote or review our portfolio, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our quotes department. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: I need a detailed cost estimate and examples of past work.
I want to review examples of your past work and get a quote for a volunteer coordination app for my veteran organization.
I need a detailed cost estimate and portfolio examples for integrating a REST API.
I need a price quote and would like to see examples of your past work.
Obtain a quote for developing a data visualization dashboard to analyze my experimental results.

contents.text: For support with an existing project or to report an issue, press 2.
To report a bug or technical issue, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support specialists.

navigationGoals: I need to report a critical bug in our live application.
I need to report a bug in the veteran services portal you developed—it crashes when I submit a support request.
I want to report a production bug in our CI/CD pipeline configuration.
I’m having an issue with the software you built and need help reporting a bug.
Report a technical issue I encountered when running the data-analysis software you developed for my project.

contents.text: For updates on your current development project, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to your project manager.

navigationGoals: I want an update on the progress of our current development project.
I’d like an update on the development progress of our case management system for veterans.
I’m calling to get an update on the current sprint deliverables and upcoming milestones.
I’d like an update on the progress of my current development project.
Get an update from my project manager on the progress of the custom simulation app you’re building.
